categories.name: Emergency Department
categories.description: Handles medical emergencies and urgent cases

categories.name: Orthopedics Department
categories.description: Focuses on musculoskeletal injuries and disorders

hospitalLaboratories.name: Clinical Chemistry Laboratory
hospitalLaboratories.purpose: Tests blood and bodily fluids for chemical composition analysis.

hospitalLaboratories.name: Hematology Laboratory
hospitalLaboratories.purpose: Analyzes blood samples for blood cell counts and disorders.

hospitalLaboratories.name: Immunology Laboratory
hospitalLaboratories.purpose: Tests the immune system's response for diagnosing autoimmune diseases and allergies.

hospitalLaboratories.name: Molecular Biology Laboratory
hospitalLaboratories.purpose: Analyzes DNA, RNA, and proteins for genetic testing and research.

hospitalLaboratories.name: Pathology Laboratory
hospitalLaboratories.purpose: Examines tissue samples and cells to diagnose diseases.

hospitalLaboratories.name: Radiology Laboratory
hospitalLaboratories.purpose: Conducts various imaging tests for diagnosing internal conditions.

hospitalLaboratories.name: Blood Bank Laboratory
hospitalLaboratories.purpose: Collects, processes, and stores blood and blood products.

hospitalLaboratories.name: Clinical Genetics Laboratory
hospitalLaboratories.purpose: Analyzes genetic material to diagnose genetic disorders.

hospitalLaboratories.name: Nuclear Medicine Laboratory
hospitalLaboratories.purpose: Uses radioactive substances for imaging and therapeutic procedures.

hospitalLaboratories.name: Cytology Laboratory
hospitalLaboratories.purpose: Examines cells collected from various body sites to detect cancer and abnormalities.

hospitalLaboratories.name: Clinical Research Laboratory
hospitalLaboratories.purpose: Conducts clinical trials and research studies to evaluate new treatments.

pharmacyProducts.name: Analgesics
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Relieves pain and discomfort.

pharmacyProducts.name: Antibiotics
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Treats bacterial infections.

pharmacyProducts.name: Antidepressants
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Manages symptoms of depression and mood disorders.

pharmacyProducts.name: Antihistamines
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Relieves allergy symptoms by blocking histamine receptors.

pharmacyProducts.name: Antipyretics
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Reduces fever and body temperature.

pharmacyProducts.name: Antivirals
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Targets and treats viral infections.

pharmacyProducts.name: Cardiovascular Medications
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Treats heart and blood vessel conditions.

pharmacyProducts.name: Respiratory Medications
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Manages respiratory conditions like asthma and COPD.

pharmacyProducts.name: Gastrointestinal Medications
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Treats digestive system issues like reflux and ulcers.

pharmacyProducts.name: Vitamins and Minerals
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Provides essential nutrients for health.

pharmacyProducts.name: Immunosuppressants
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Suppresses immune responses, often used in transplant patients.

pharmacyProducts.name: Muscle Relaxants
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Eases muscle tension and spasms.

pharmacyProducts.name: Diuretics
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Promotes urine production and fluid elimination.

pharmacyProducts.name: Dermatological Medications
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Treats skin conditions and disorders.

pharmacyProducts.name: Hormone Replacement Therapy
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Replaces or supplements hormones.

pharmacyProducts.name: Anticoagulants
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Prevents blood clot formation.

pharmacyProducts.name: Opioid Analgesics
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Powerful pain relievers derived from opium.

pharmacyProducts.name: Glycemic Control Medications
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Manages blood sugar levels in diabetes patients.

pharmacyProducts.name: Ophthalmic Medications
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Treats eye conditions and diseases.

pharmacyProducts.name: Otic Medications
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Treats ear infections and issues.

pharmacyProducts.name: Cough Syrup
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Relieves cough and soothes throat irritation.

pharmacyProducts.name: Antacid Chewable Tablets
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Relieves heartburn and indigestion symptoms.

pharmacyProducts.name: Multivitamin Supplements
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Provides essential vitamins and minerals for overall health.

pharmacyProducts.name: Nasal Decongestant Spray
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Clears nasal congestion and improves breathing.

pharmacyProducts.name: Antibacterial Hand Sanitizer
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Kills germs and bacteria to maintain hand hygiene.

pharmacyProducts.name: First Aid Kit
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Contains essential items for basic medical emergencies.

pharmacyProducts.name: Eye Drops
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Relieves dry and irritated eyes.

pharmacyProducts.name: Digestive Enzyme Supplements
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Aids in digestion and nutrient absorption.

pharmacyProducts.name: Allergy Relief Tablets
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Provides relief from allergy symptoms.

pharmacyProducts.name: Sleep Aid Tablets
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Promotes better sleep and relaxation.

pharmacyProducts.name: Sunscreen Lotion
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Protects skin from harmful UV rays and sunburn.

pharmacyProducts.name: Antifungal Cream
pharmacyProducts.purpose: Treats fungal infections like athlete's foot.
